about_the_game:
This DLC includes 6 new elf girls for Real Girl VR:
- Akasha
- Lithye
- Nushala
- Raejiisa
- Syndra
- Veara

Also, it includes 8 new clothes set for elf girls and 1 new location!
You can check it out the new location from the game menu, but to interact with it you need to have this DLC.
Have fun! We are working really hard to make Real Girl VR the best sex simulator there is!

content_descriptors.notes:
This game is a sex simulator with girls. 
There are 20 different girls and some locations to experience virtual sex with them. You can use your Mouse or your VR Headset/controllers for interaction.

You can interact with the woman in many ways! Choosing the sex position and location you want to see her in action!
All girls are different from each other with personality, body shape, and ethnicity.

What you can expect related to sexual content:
- 20 fully and detailed naked bodies, genitals, and locations.
- sexual face expressions.
- animated sex positions.
- sexy and sensual clothes and voices.

They are ALL ABOVE 18 YEARS OLD.

detailed_description:
This DLC includes 6 new elf girls for Real Girl VR:
- Akasha
- Lithye
- Nushala
- Raejiisa
- Syndra
- Veara

Also, it includes 8 new clothes set for elf girls and 1 new location!
You can check it out the new location from the game menu, but to interact with it you need to have this DLC.
Have fun! We are working really hard to make Real Girl VR the best sex simulator there is!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS Catalina, Mojave (Liberty), High Sierra, Sierra, OSX El Capitan, Yosemite, Mavericks
  • Processor: Dual core 3Ghz+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB Video Memory
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Default
  • Additional Notes: There are no VR devices for MacOS yet. But you can play as a desktop version!
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOS Catalina, Mojave (Liberty), High Sierra, Sierra, OSX El Capitan, Yosemite, Mavericks
  • Processor: Dual core 3Ghz+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB Video memory
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Default
  • Additional Notes: You don't need a VR Headset to use this game. But it is awesome with it!

Minimum:

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD equivalent or greater
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Default
  • Additional Notes: You don't need a VR Headset to use this game. But it is awesome with it!

  • Processor: Intel Core i7 6700K equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 980 / AMD equivalent or greater
